text:
s5
As a paraplegic who was able to walk again, I scoured every corner of the planet, from ancient libraries to wrestling wisdom from jungle shamans to find the best recovery techniques.
Now, I'm dedicated to sharing them with others like me.

cc @_buildspace @_nightsweekends https://t.co/0bTheBDeDe

user_info.name: Robin
user_info.description: helping spinal cord injury patients walking again
